title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses – simple, light, and easy to enjoy.

What it is:
- A light pair of glasses (about 75 grams) that shows a big, clear picture in front of your eyes. Think of it like a personal big-screen TV you can wear.

What you can watch:
- Popular apps like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock.
- You can also get more apps from Google Play.
- Works with protected streaming (HDCP), so shows and movies play correctly.

Easy to use:
- Works with Android phones, iPhones, and Windows computers.
- Plug in with the included USB‑C cable or HDMI adapter, or use the wireless adapter. Pick what’s easiest for you.
- Runs on Android TV 12, a familiar, simple TV-style menu.

Clear and comfortable picture:
- Large, sharp Micro‑OLED display that looks like a 360-inch screen from a distance.
- Certified for eye comfort by TüV Rheinland.
- Built-in focus adjustment for near‑sighted users from 0.00D to -6.00D. Turn the dial until it looks clear—no extra glasses needed for many people.

Fun extras:
- Cloud gaming is supported, so you can play games without a big console.

Why seniors like it:
- No heavy headset; it’s light and balanced.
- Simple connections and easy menus.
- Big picture without a big TV—great for travel, small spaces, or watching without disturbing others.

Getting started is simple:
1) Charge your phone or device.
2) Plug the glasses into USB‑C or use the HDMI/wireless adapter.
3) Put them on and adjust the focus until the image is sharp.
4) Open your streaming app and press play.

Enjoy your shows, movies, and games on a big, comfortable screen—anytime, anywhere—with Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses.
